ing: 1/2 cup JET-PUFFED Fruit Flavoured Mini Marshmallows, cut in half
des: "Try our Confetti Peanut Butter Snack Bites with the extra crunch of crushed rice cereal and fruit flavoured mini marshmallows. Our easy-to-make recipe is sure to be a favourite with your family."
ins:
Mix peanut butter and honey in medium bowl until blended. Stir in remaining ingredients. Refrigerate for 20 to 30 min.
Roll into 20 (1-inch) balls, using about 2 Tbsp. for each.
